thread.title: IntelAgree Recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Contract Lifecycle Management
thread.title_full: IntelAgree Recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Contract Lifecycle Management

author: IntelAgree
title: IntelAgree Recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Contract Lifecycle Management
text:
TAMPA, Fla., Oct. 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- IntelAgree, a leading AI-powered contract lifecycle management (CLM) platform, is proud to announce its first-time inclusion in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Contract Lifecycle Management. We believe this recognition highlights IntelAgree's rapid rise as a competitive player in the CLM space, providing a modern approach to contract management that transforms the way businesses operate.
